generated_clips.description: A nervous penguin in a tiny bow tie sits alone at a fancy restaurant table, checking his watch with a worried expression. Across from him is an empty chair with a wilted rose on the plate. He looks sad and disappointed.
A fluffy golden retriever excitedly holds up his phone showing vacation photos to a clearly bored cat sitting across from him at a coffee shop. The cat has her eyes half-closed in a dramatic yawn.
generated_clips.audio_prompt: Awkward silence punctuated by enthusiastic barking.

generated_clips.description: A proud peacock with fully spread magnificent feathers stands in a beautiful park, looking confused as a tiny unimpressed sparrow flies away in the background. The peacock's expression shows disappointment.
A sad panda sits alone at a ramen shop counter, slurping noodles with a lonely expression. Empty seats surround him. Steam rises from the bowl. The mood is melancholic but cute.
Close-up of a happy otter holding a glowing smartphone, his face illuminated by the warm light from the screen. His eyes are wide with excitement and joy as pink hearts float around him.
generated_clips.audio_prompt: Upbeat music kicks in. Notification sounds.

generated_clips.description: Two adorable penguins in matching bow ties meet at a restaurant entrance, both looking surprised and delighted to see each other. Pink hearts float between them. The scene is romantic and heartwarming.
Two elegant flamingos stand in a beautiful sunset lake, their long necks curved together to form a perfect heart shape. Golden light reflects on the water. The scene is romantic and serene.

A group of happy animal couples gathered in a beautiful park at golden hour - penguins, flamingos, otters, cats and dogs - all looking at the camera with joyful expressions. Confetti and hearts fill the air.
generated_clips.audio_prompt: Music crescendos. Voiceover: 'WildMatch. Where every animal finds their person.'
